name: Practical Facebook Update [2010]
description:
ESTHETIC:
-Transparent blue bar (top) has shadow now.
-Transparent Message bar (bottom) is visible when "onmouseover".
-Fonts with shadow and smooth.
-Smaller Headers.
-[NEW] Transparency in every drop down menu (Notifications, Friend Requests, Messages, Account)

USEFUL:
-Static blue bar.
-Static left sidebar.
So you can access main links (inbox, events, friends) wherever you scroll on page.
